Class Army

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Army
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Army
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class regrouping all the characters belonging to one side of the game
    See Also:

      • rmCharacter

        public int rmCharacter(Character character)
        Remove a character from the army
        Parameters:
        character - the character to remove
        Returns:
        a return code: 0 - The army doesn't contain the character 1 - The character has successfully been removed from the character

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Inform if the army still has fighters or not
        Returns:
        true if the army has fighters, false if not

      • moveCharacter

        public int moveCharacter(Character movingCharacter,
                         Cell cell)
        Try to move a character to destination cell
        Parameters:
        movingCharacter - the character to move
        cell - the destination cell
        Returns:
        a return code: 0 - There is an ally on the requested cell 1 - The movement is not possible for such a character 2 + goTo() - The return code of the goTo method

        Get a character inside the army according to an index
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the character is returned from the list or null if it doesn't exist
